backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, app settings, weekly sermon cache, and latest app release with admin-checked access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new weekly prayer-time features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose, features, and behavior.
frontend/docs/android-webview-template.m: Guide for building a Kotlin Android WebView wrapper app with caching, JS bridge, notifications, and alarm scheduling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining light/dark OKLCH color variables, borders, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, root div, and main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with vivid background, header, tab navigation, and routing across all feature tabs.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Stub AuthButton component that renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Mobile tab navigation component using shadcn Tabs with overflow menu and decorative backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Card prompting users to pick a location, with icon and navigation callback.
frontend/src/components/TabsOverflowMenu: Renders a dropdown menu listing overflow tab items and triggers tab selection callbacks.
Provides static morning and evening adhkar items with text, translations, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/adhkar/MorningEven: Displays morning/evening adhkar lists with completion tracking and reset actions using saved settings.
frontend/src/features/app-release/curren: Defines the current app semantic version string.
frontend/src/features/app-release/semver: Implements semantic version comparison and a helper to check if a version is newer.
frontend/src/features/app-release/Update: Shows a dismissible prompt when a newer app version is available, linking to the store update.
frontend/src/features/app-release/update: Handles localStorage operations for remembering dismissed update prompts.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useIsC: React Query hook checking admin status from the actor for role‑based UI control.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useLat: Fetches latest app release metadata from the backend with React Query.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useUpd: Provides a mutation to update release metadata and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/duaGuide: Dua kategorileri, kategori bilgileri ve her kategoriye ait dua nesnelerinin listelerini tanımlar.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/DuaGuide: Renders a dua guide with category tabs, list view, and a modal for dua details.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Her Esmaül Hüsna öğesini renkli, tıklanabilir bir kart olarak görüntüleyen bileşen.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna için id, Arapça isim, okunuş, Türkçe anlam ve dua içeren veri listesini sağlar.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna listesini kartlar halinde gösterir ve seçilen ismin detaylarını bir dialog içinde açar.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Fa: Nafile ve kaza oruç tarihlerini, hedefleri ve Ramazan gün durumlarını yöneten ana takip arayüzü.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Ra: Ramazan için 30 günlük oruç durumlarını gösteren, ilerleme hesaplayan ve sıfırlama seçenekleri sunan bölüm.
frontend/src/features/hatim/HatimTakipTa: React tab for tracking Quran reading progress, allowing page input, increment/decrement, reset, and saving via settings.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Utility determining the current prayer slot by converting adjusted prayer times to minutes and comparing with the current time.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Main home screen showing location selector, next prayer countdown, prayer cards, weekly times, and weather using user settings.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifButton.t: A styled button wrapper adding an Islamic tile-pattern overlay around a standard UI button.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifFrame.ts: Wrapper component that decorates content with optional ornamental corners or divider flourishes.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Displays the next prayer time and remaining countdown, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Shows four prayer-related cards (verse, hadith, dua, esma) with a dialog for expanded content based on current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Defines a DuaItem interface and exports a list of dua objects with Arabic text, Turkish meanings, and usage occasions.
Defines a HadithItem interface and provides a list of hadith entries with Arabic text, Turkish translations, and source references.
Defines a VerseItem interface and exports Quran verse entries with Arabic text, Turkish meanings, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: React hook that computes and updates the current prayer slot every minute based on adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: React hook that determines the next prayer and calculates the remaining time, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content based on the current prayer slot using seeded logic.
frontend/src/features/home/WeeklyPrayerT: Renders a table of weekly prayer times with loading and error fallback UI.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: Component allowing users to search, view, and select a location using geocoding results and app settings.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Provides functions to fetch geocoding results from Open-Meteo and convert them into internal location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines Location and GeocodingResult interfaces used in location-related features.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that performs debounced geocoding searches based on user input.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Renders the prayer tutorial UI with rakat info, gender-based step flow, and scrollable step cards.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Defines types and provides rakat counts plus detailed men’s and women’s prayer steps.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/dista: Implements Haversine distance calculation and formatting for display.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Provides a UI for searching locations via geocoding and selecting or saving them for mosque lookup.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/nearb: Fetches nearby mosques from Overpass API, parses results, computes distances, and returns sorted entries.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Loads and displays nearby mosques based on active or temporary location with adjustable search radius.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/types: Defines the NearbyMosque interface for mosque data.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/useNe: React Query hook fetching nearby mosques using coordinates and radius.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Holds notification text templates and helpers for prayer-time notifications.
frontend/src/features/prayer-tracker/Pra: UI for tracking daily and kaza prayers, updating checklist state and counters via app settings.
Fetches today's prayer times from the Aladhan API and normalizes them into a local format.
frontend/src/features/prayer/aladhanWeek: Retrieves seven days of prayer times from Aladhan and formats each day with labels.
frontend/src/features/prayer/kerahatTime: Computes kerahat time windows and merges them with prayer times into a sorted list.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Displays adjusted prayer times with kerahat windows, allows offset editing, and loads times based on location.
Applies minute offsets to individual or full sets of prayer times, including weekly lists.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that fetches and caches daily prayer times for a location.
frontend/src/features/prayer/useWeeklyPr: React Query hook for fetching and caching weekly prayer times based on location.
frontend/src/features/qibla/QiblaFinderT: UI for calculating and displaying Qibla direction using device orientation and stored location.
frontend/src/features/qibla/qiblaMath.ts: Provides math utilities to compute Qibla bearing from coordinates and normalize angles.
frontend/src/features/qibla/useDeviceOri: React hook that handles device-orientation permissions and listens for heading updates to provide compass data.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/qura: Client API layer fetching surah metadata, Arabic text, Turkish translation, and audio with caching and fallback URLs.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/Qura: UI component for listing surahs, loading surah content, managing reading state, and controlling ayah audio playback.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useA: React hook wrapping HTMLAudioElement to play ayah audio with controls, auto‑next, and loading/error tracking.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useQ: Persists and restores reading state such as last surah, ayah, and scroll position using app settings.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/fastingBas: Static content defining Ramazan fasting basics with headings and paragraphs for display.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/ramadanMen: Defines the RamadanMenu interface and a 30‑day dataset of sahur and iftar menus.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/RamazanKos: Ramadan section UI showing prayer times, location setup, tarawih info, and daily rotating menu.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/tarawihCon: Exports structured text content describing Tarawih prayer details and sections.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/useDailyRo: React hook that selects a daily rotating Ramadan menu based on the date and updates at midnight.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/dat: Utility functions for local day calculations and Turkish date formatting.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/hij: Converts Hijri events to Gregorian dates for a given year by scanning dates using Intl APIs.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/rel: Provides fixed 2026 religious day data with Gregorian dates and Hijri details.
Type definitions for Hijri events and computed Gregorian religious day objects.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/Rel: UI component displaying 2026 religious days with next-up highlighting and full list rendering.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/use: Hook returning 2026 religious days plus logic for determining the next upcoming event.
frontend/src/features/sermon/CumaHutbesi: Empty placeholder file for the Friday sermon tab component.
frontend/src/features/sermon/useLatestSe: Empty placeholder file for fetching the latest sermon.
frontend/src/features/settings/AdminAppR: Admin UI section allowing version and Play Store URL updates with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Defines the TypeScript model for all app settings including location, notifications, fasting, Quran progress, and prayer counters.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Manages loading, saving, defaults, and versioned migration of settings stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: UI for adjusting time offset and per‑prayer notification lead times, using app settings state and save actions.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: React hook that loads, caches, and updates app settings via react‑query and local storage.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/tasbihatD: Provides static tasbihat items with Arabic, transliteration, translation, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/TasbihatT: Renders a scrollable list of post‑prayer tasbihat items with Arabic text, translations, and counts.
frontend/src/features/weather/CompactWea: Shows a small inline weather summary using stored location and fetched weather data.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches and normalizes weather data from Open‑Meteo and maps codes to human‑readable descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React hook for fetching weather data based on the current location with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Full weather UI displaying temperature, conditions, wind, and humidity, prompting for location if missing.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: React component providing a digital counter with target setting, progress display, and persistence via app settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and patterned background utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/nativeNotifications.t: Utility for sending Android WebView native notifications with fallbacks, plus helpers for prayer and generic notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins to match the project's design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project state for implementing a 7‑day prayer times feature, including existing features, requirements, and pending requests.
